name: 簡良翰
objective:
Course Outline:
Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.
課程大綱：
本課程介紹熱能交換原理與熱交換相關之工程技術。使學生熟悉低溫熱交換中之分析熱效率、選擇材料之方法，及選用高效率熱交換器表面形狀之技術。內容包括：流力、熱交換基礎原理；氣冷式散熱鰭片分析、再生式熱交換器、管內與管集之單相熱傳、壓降計算；冷凝器、蒸發器等兩相熱交換器之設計；以及各種幾何變數、殼管式熱交換器之答拉瓦計算法、強化熱傳表面、鰭片管、熱傳表面積垢之問題與對策。
schedule:
週次 / Week	 授課內容 /Topic
1	Introduction of heat exchangers 熱交換器簡介 
2	Types of heat exchangers an their applications 各種熱交換器之分類及應用
3   Fluid flow and heat transfer fundamentals in heat exchangers 熱交換器流力及熱傳基本觀念之回顧
4	Fundamental theories of heat exchanger design 熱交換之設計方法導論　
5	Design methods of heat exchangers 熱交換之設計流程
6	Design of double pipe heat exchangers, fin analysis 套管式熱交換器之設計、鰭片分析
7	Analysis of compact heat exchangers 密集式熱交換器之分析
8	Heat transfer and pressure drop of compact heat exchangers 密集式熱交換器熱傳及壓損
9	Midterm exam 期中考
10	An example of compact heat exchanger design 密集式熱交換器之計算實例　
11	Evaluation of heat exchangers 熱交換器之性能評估
12	Heat and mass transfer of direct contact heat exchangers 熱質傳與直接接觸式熱交換器
13	Plate type heat exchangers 板式熱交換器
14	Regenerative heat exchangers 再生式熱交換器　
15	Shell and Tube heat exchangers 殼管式熱交換器
16	Analysis of shell and tube heat exchangers 殼管式熱交換器之分析
17	Fouling problems and solutions of heat exchangers 熱交換器積垢之問題與對策	　
18	Final exam 期末考
scorePolicy: Homework: 30%, Midterm: 30%, Term Report 15%, Final Exam: 25%.
